articles.title: Apple acquires French startup specialising in AI compression and computer vision tech - The Hindu
articles.description: Apple acquired Datakalab, a Paris-based startup that specialises in artificial intelligence compression and computer vision technology. While the exact details of the deal are not known, the acquisition represents a significant investment for Apple which acquired 100% stakes in the seven-year-old startup.
